params._processContract: The address of a process contract

params._address: Address of user to be toggled

returns._0: address[] Array of process contract addresses specified to a supplier

returns._4: address[] Array of process contract addresses assigned to project

returns._0: uint256[] Array of projects ids specified to a client

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.      * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addProcessToProject(uint256,address).notice: Adds a process address to a specific project

createProcess(address,bytes32).notice: Creates a new process and deploys contract

getProcessesByAddress(address).notice: Returns processes assigned to a supplier

getProjectDetails(uint256).notice: Returns details of a project id

getProjectsByAddress(address).notice: Returns projects assigned to a client

getUser(address).notice: Returns specific information about one user
